alphabetsoup.framework
Interface LetterStation

All Known Implementing Classes:
LetterStationAgent, LetterStationAgent, LetterStationBase
public interface LetterStation

LetterStation defines the interface that letter stations must provide to operate in AlphabetSoup.

Author:
Chris Hazard

Method Summary

Method Detail

getCapacity

int getCapacity()
Returns the maximum capacity of the LetterStation in terms of number of Letter bundles

Returns:
maximum number of Letter bundles LetterStation can store

getBundleSize

int getBundleSize()
Returns the number of identical Letters that are delivered to the LetterStation (bundle) at the same time

Returns:
number of letters per bundle

addBundle

void addBundle(Letter l)
Adds a bundle of the given Letter to the LetterStation

Parameters:
l - Letter tile type which makes up bundle

getAssignedLetters

java.util.Collection<Letter> getAssignedLetters()
Returns a Collection of all the letter bundles currently being held at the LetterStation

Returns:
Collection of assigned letter bundles

requestLetter

void requestLetter(Bucketbot bb,
                   Letter l)
Requests that the LetterStation transfer the Letters to the Bucket

Parameters:
bb - Bucketbot that is carrying the bucket where the letters should be placed (if the within range)
l - References to the letter that should be placed in the Bucket
